title: Bloomberg Markets: Riverfront's Smyth on Low Market Volatility
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Riverfront's Smyth on Low Market Volatility
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Rod Smyth Chief Investment Strategist Riverfront Investment Group Discussing the markets and and why he sees low volatility and a stable economic world.
